summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Vue 3 Servicio Técnico management system. All major features working correctly with dummy data, including login, dashboard, citas management, calendar, new visit forms, and history with PDF generation.

ui_bugs.issue: PDF preview modal not opening when clicking download buttons in historial
Logout functionality not accessible through user menu - no visible logout option

issues: Preview URL (stage-preview.emergentagent.com) is not accessible - app is in sleep mode

passed_tests: Login page loads correctly with demo account buttons
Login with admin@servicio.com / admin123 works and redirects to dashboard
Dashboard shows KPI cards (4), Doughnut chart, Line chart, and upcoming appointments
Navigation sidebar shows correct menu items based on user role
Citas page shows table with 5 appointments and search/filter functionality
Calendario page loads with FullCalendar and 3 pending tasks sidebar
Nueva Visita form has all 6 sections: Orden, Cliente, Diagnóstico, Inventario, Facturación, Firmas
Form dropdowns work correctly (inspection types, clients, technicians)
Historial page shows 3 completed visits with search filters
Signature canvases present in Nueva Visita form
Responsive design works on mobile viewport
All data properly displayed using Pinia store mock data
ECharts integration working for dashboard visualizations
FullCalendar integration working with drag-drop tasks
Form validation and data binding working correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix PDF preview modal functionality in Historial page and add accessible logout option in user menu. Consider waking up the stage-preview deployment for external access testing.
